item.title: [pi] command er just dont work
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:1, topic:401918”]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“resetslayer”) && c.magePoints >= 3 ) {
c.slayerTask = 0;
c.taskAmount = 0;
c.magePoints -=3;
c.sendMessage (“Your slayer Task is reset”);
}else if(playerCommand.startsWith(“resetslayer”)) {
c.sendMessage(“You need atleast 3 Slayer points to reset task”);
}

how come? not my first time making a command[/quote]

hmm im asuming your looking for resting the task?
i haven’t tried ingame but im 99% sure itll work jsut fine!

if (playerCommand.startsWith("resettask")) { c.taskAmount = -1; c.slayerTask = 0; }

if its not then im srry mate :s

Read full topic
